ui_balloon_text: OpenJDK version 1.${openjdk_MAJOR_VERSION}.0.${openjdk_UPDATE}-${openjdk_RPMBUILD}.b${openjdk_BUILD} is available for download
ui_update_header: OpenJDK version 1.${openjdk_MAJOR_VERSION}.0.${openjdk_UPDATE}-${openjdk_RPMBUILD}.b${openjdk_BUILD} is available for download
ui_update_text:
${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_UPDATE_MESSAGE}

To proceed with download and installation please follow a link above, download page will be opened inside your web-browser.

To change a schedule of this notification please see '${openjdk_VENDOR_DIRNAME}_jdk_update_checker' and '${openjdk_VENDOR_DIRNAME}_jdk_update_notifier' tasks in 'Task Scheduler'.

To disable this notification permanently please select the installed application in 'Programs and Features' with a right-click, choose 'Change' and disable 'Update Notifier' installation feature.
